attributes.action: Introduce a student fare on the Manchester Metrolink service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The student fare would provide those in full time further education with the opportunity to purchase a concessionary- rate ticket when using the Metrolink service. Proof of status would be photographic and dated student ID. Demand is present- Manchester holds Europe's largest student population. Need is present- students are currently priced out of the service. Necessary infrastructure is present- it merely requires GMPTE to alter one button on every Metrolink ticket machine!
